title: Coupchella Night 1, Titanic Rip Offs 06.13.22
itunes:title: Coupchella Night 1, Titanic Rip Offs 06.13.22
description:
In episode 1267, Miles and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by writer, comedian, and host of TV, I Say w/ Ashley Ray, Ashley Ray, to discuss… Jan 6 hearings, The reaction from the RIGHT, Life-Sized Titanic Replicas Are a Bad Idea (and Sometimes a Scam) and more!

  1. Jan 6 Hearings
  2. Life-Sized Titanic Replicas Are a Bad Idea (and Sometimes a Scam)
  3. Halifax had grim role in Titanic tragedy
  4. The Titanic copy-cats that have been as ill-fated as the original ship
  5. A full-size replica of the Titanic — complete with simulated iceberg crash — is being built in China
  6. Chinese theme park Titanic replica upsets families
  7. A Titanic fraud?

LISTEN: Só Para Você (feat. VHOOR) by Juniper & Sango

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
